CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 14-17 A variety of good donor moieties , including oligothiophenes , 18-23 carbazole , 24 benzo[1,2-b:4,5-b′]dithiophene , 25-27 and dithienosilole , 14,28 have been demonstrated as useful for low band gap polymers ; good acceptor moieties including thieno- [3,4-b]thiophenes substituted with electron - withdrawing groups , 29-31 N-alkylthieno [3,4-c]pyrrole-4,6-dione , 25,28 benzothiadiazole , 24,32 and 2,5-bis(2-alkyl)pyrrolo [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-(2H,5H)-dione 33-36 have been developed.

Let's think step by step.

1. Oligothiophenes
2. Carbazole
3. Benzo[1,2-b:4,5-b′]dithiophene
4. Dithienosilole
5. Thieno-[3,4-b]thiophenes substituted with electron-withdrawing groups
6. N-alkylthieno [3,4-c]pyrrole-4,6-dione
7. Benzothiadiazole
8. 2,5-bis(2-alkyl)pyrrolo [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-(2H,5H)-dione

These are the "Material Name" entities in the given paragraph. They are all chemical compounds that have been used or developed for low band gap polymers.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. Oligothiophenes
2. Carbazole
3. Benzo[1,2-b:4,5-b′]dithiophene
4. Dithienosilole
5. Thieno-[3,4-b]thiophenes
6. N-alkylthieno [3,4-c]pyrrole-4,6-dione
7. Benzothiadiazole
8. 2,5-bis(2-alkyl)pyrrolo [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-(2H,5H)-dione

These are the entities that clearly refer to Material Names in the given paragraph. I have removed any ambiguous or irrelevant entities.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Oligothiophenes |
| Carbazole |
| Benzo[1,2-b:4,5-b′]dithiophene |
| Dithienosilole |
| Thieno-[3,4-b]thiophenes |
| N-alkylthieno [3,4-c]pyrrole-4,6-dione |
| Benzothiadiazole |
| 2,5-bis(2-alkyl)pyrrolo [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-(2H,5H)-dione |

4. dithienosilole
